items.name: accountId
items.title: Account ID
items.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

defaultValue.query: FROM Transaction SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE duration < 0.1) as 'Response times < 100ms'

items.name: criticalThreshold
items.title: Critical threshold
items.description: Value at which progress is displayed as critical

items.name: highValuesAreSuccess
items.title: Above threshold is success
items.description: If toggled on, values above the threshold display as successful. Otherwise, values at or above the threshold display as critical.
